name: Spot The Differences 2020 | 大家来找茬 2020
name_original: Spot The Differences 2020 | 大家来找茬 2020
description:
Spot The Differences 2020 is a classic game to find different.

Collect a large number of scenery, places of interest, beautiful women pictures, find out the difference, complete the challenge, test your eyesight and test your efficiency.

This is a pure game for everyone to find Differences. It's rich in content and cheap. It's definitely a good game for your leisure and entertainment.




The game includes:

  • 50 different levels
  • Three different difficulties
  • Beautiful pictures
  • 5 great soundtracks
